In the Curve pool used, ynETH must be the pool member at index 0 (`coins(0)`).","kind":"dev","methods":{"decimals()":{"returns":{"decimals_":"The number of decimals"}},"latestRoundData()":{"details":"Does not pass through round-related values, to avoid misinterpretation. latestRoundData().details: Does not pass through round-related values, to avoid misinterpretation. Does not check the rate timestamp of the ynETH-wstETH Curve pool. This rate is assumed to be up-to-date, since if the market rate changes, pool balances will be arbitraged to correct it, refreshing the rate timestamp.

returns.answer_: The price of the derivative asset quoted in ETH
returns.startedAt_: The `startedAt_` value returned by the wstETH/ETH aggregator `latestRoundData()`
returns.updatedAt_: The `updatedAt_` value returned by the wstETH/ETH aggregator `latestRoundData()`

decimals().notice: The number of precision decimals in the aggregator answer

latestRoundData().notice: Returns Chainlink-like latest round data for the derivative asset
